snippet.title: RIPOUT - Steam Next Fest Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
The RIPOUT demo is now available as part of Steam Next Fest (the demo will drop on June 13th at 10AM Pacific / 7PM CEST coinciding with the beginning of the festival)! This is your first chance to get your hands on the game’s surreal PetGun and take on the terrifying monstrosities that await in the cold, dark depths of space in solo or co-op action for up to three players.

Wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1558830/RIPOUT/

RIPOUT is an online co-op horror FPS that will have players fight their way through procedurally generated derelict ships filled with mutants capable of reconfiguring their alien bodies. Survive with your trusty Pet Gun companion, collect loot, and customize your character to fit your playstyle.

https://3drealms.com/
https://slipgate-studios.com/
